did.unittitle: Josephine Gomon to Bill and Olga (Josephine's son and daughter-in-law)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Bill and Olga reside in Florida for the bulk of the correspondence. The correspondence is mostly about past or contemporary personal events. Includes discussion of John F. Kennedy's assassination, Vietnam, CIA, Wayne State University, James Thurber, ACLU, Giffels suit, Josephine's health, family events, Frank Murphy, prison changes, Goddard School, Bill of Rights, and the Peace March.
